landingAboutUsVachanProjectContent1: a premier cross platform Bible study tool in Indian languages
landingAboutUsVachanProjectContent2: is a companion mobile app for this site
landingAboutUsVachanProjectContent3: was established to provide free access to digital scripture engagement resources. You are free to use this for your personal Bible study or small groups and gatherings. Please note that many of the resources available are copyrighted. These are being made available here on VachanOnline under multiple licensing arrangements. Hence, the content is not for further redistribution in any other format or platform without explicit permission from the original copyright owners.
landingAboutUsContent3: , is being made available under a collaborative arrangement with multiple partners and
landingAboutUsContent4: ; who is the localization and technology partner.
landingAboutUsTechnologyMsg: BCS team has developed this platform inspired by similar initiatives in other countries. A cloud based, API driven, Biblical Computing engine - VachanEngine is the back-end of this. These Vachan APIs can be made available for digital content delivery on request.
landingAlt: Get it on the play store
landingPlayStoreToolTip: Get the app on the Google Play Store
landingWelcomeMessage2: app is a premier Scripture Engagement website in Indian Languages!
landingWelcomeMessage3: So what is Scripture engagement? It is a way of studying the Bible with resources and tools to assist you understand the Bible. With a host of commentaries, videos, audio Bibles and reading plans in your heart language, our desire is that you will find this website to be a place where you can interact with Scripture, find resources to understand it, journal your spiritual growth and enjoy developing a growing relationship with God.
landingWelcomeMessage5: companion app enables you take your Bible and your Notes with you wherever you go!

audioMessage1:
Audio bible not available in {{value}} for this book.
It is available only for Mark, Luke, 1st and 2nd Thessalonians.
Use the book dropdown in the left panel to navigate.
